dcterms:creator: Shuiwang Ji
Wei Xu
Ming Yang
dcterms:description: The CASIA-B Gait Dataset consists of 15000 videos of 124 subjects' walking patterns captured from 11 different angles, with subjects carrying objects such as bags and coats. It is used for training a 3D Convolutional Neural Network (3D-CNN) to identify individuals based on their gait features.
dcterms:title: CASIA-B Gait Dataset

dcterms:creator: Zifeng Wu
Yongzhen Huang
Liang Wang
Xiaogang Wang
Tieniu Tan
dcterms:description: The CASIA Gait Dataset-B is a comprehensive dataset used for cross-view gait-based human identification with deep CNNs. It contains gait data from multiple subjects under various conditions.
dcterms:title: CASIA Gait Dataset-B
